00027 class tx_dynaflex_mailformplusplus {

00036         function addFields_controller($config) {
00037                 $optionList[0] = array(0 => "Single Page", 1 => "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Default");
00038                 $optionList[1] = array(0 => "Multi Page", 1 => "F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Multistep");
00039                 $config['items'] = $optionList;
00040                 return $config;
00041         }
00042         
00050         function addFields_predefined ($config) {
00051                 
00052                 global $LANG;
00053 
00054                 $ts = $this->loadTS($config['row']['pid']);
00055 
00056                         # no config available
00057                 if (!is_array($ts['plugin.']['F3_MailformPlusPlus.']['settings.']['predef.']) || sizeof($ts['plugin.']['F3_MailformPlusPlus.']['settings.']['predef.']) == 0) {
00058                         $optionList[] = array(0 => $LANG->sL('LLL:EXT:mailformplusplus/Resources/Language/locallang_db.xml:be_missing_config'), 1 => '');
00059                         return $config['items'] = array_merge($config['items'],$optionList);
00060                 }
00061 
00062                 $predef = array();
00063                 # for each view
00064                 foreach($ts['plugin.']['F3_MailformPlusPlus.']['settings.']['predef.'] as $key=>$view) {
00065 
00066                         if (is_array($view)) {
00067                                         $beName = $view['name'];
00068                                         if (!$predef[$key]) $predef[$key] = $beName;
00069                         }
00070                 }
00071                 
00072                 $optionList = array();
00073                 $optionList[] = array(0 => $LANG->sL('LLL:EXT:mailformplusplus/Resources/Language/locallang_db.xml:be_please_select'), 1 => '');
00074                 foreach($predef as $k => $v) {
00075                         $optionList[] = array(0 => $v, 1 => $k);
00076                 }
00077                 $config['items'] = array_merge($config['items'],$optionList);
00078                 return $config;
00079         }
00080 
00088         function loadTS($pageUid) {
00089                 $sysPageObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_pageSelect');
00090                 $rootLine = $sysPageObj->getRootLine($pageUid);
00091                 $TSObj = t3lib_div::makeInstance('t3lib_tsparser_ext');
00092                 $TSObj->tt_track = 0;
00093                 $TSObj->init();
00094                 $TSObj->runThroughTemplates($rootLine);
00095                 $TSObj->generateConfig();
00096                 return $TSObj->setup;
00097         }
00098 }
